title: WP_REST_API_Block
description: A reusable block object in a REST API context.

date.description: The date the block was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the block was published, as GMT.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier for the block.

raw.description: GUID for the block, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: GUID for the block, transformed for display.

modified.description: The date the block was last modified, in the site's timezone.

modified_gmt.description: The date the block was last modified, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the block unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the block.

type.description: Type of Post for the block.

password.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

raw.description: Title for the block, as it exists in the database.
Content for the block, as it exists in the database.

block_version.description: Version of the content block format used by the block. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

protected.description: Whether the content is protected with a password.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the block.
